General.Name: Plano & Plano Desenvolvimento Imobiliário S.A
General.Description: Plano & Plano Desenvolvimento Imobiliário S.A., through its subsidiaries develops, constructs, and sells real estate projects in the São Paulo Metropolitan Region. It also provides construction, supervision, studies, projects, and the execution of civil engineering works. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Samuel Morse, nº 74, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04576-060
